name: Replika
description:
Wow! That was rush! 

I made this little game about investigation and interactive fiction, using the engine called Bitsy 3D.

All the content (with exception to the music) was created in the Bitsy.

The music was created using Online Sequencer.

I only has 17 hours to make this little game. I hope that at least all you enjoyed. Haha!

Thank you for playing it!
